Change the filter cartridge as often as instructed by the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 按照生产厂家的使用说明，经常更换过滤筒。

sentences.en: He aimed his rifle, fired a single shot, then ejected the spent cartridge.
sentences.cn: 他用步枪瞄准，射出一枚子弹，然后退出空弹壳。

sentences.en: He felt confident that one cartridge remained to him.
sentences.cn: 他觉得有十足的把握,他还剩下一粒子弹.

sentences.en: In MSS , to move data from a data cartridge to a staging drive.
sentences.cn: 在海量存储系统(MSS) 中, 把数据从数据盒带传送到登台驱动器.

sentences.en: Is there a cartridge in your gun?
sentences.cn: 你的枪里装有子弹 吗 ?

sentences.en: Logic valves comprise cartridge elements and covers with pilot passages.
sentences.cn: 插装阀是由插装元件(插件)和带先导通路的阀盖组成的.

sentences.en: Only four of the five spent cartridges were recovered by police.
sentences.cn: 5个子弹壳中只有4个被警方收回。

sentences.en: Other sectors are fighting , and we hardly spend a cartridge a week.
sentences.cn: 别的地方,天天都要冲锋陷阵, 我们这儿一星期也放不了一梭子.

sentences.en: Print quality is also affected by color cartridge use time and usage.
sentences.cn: 打印质量也受到不黑白墨盒搁置工夫和搁置环境的感化.

sentences.en: The cartridge must be replaced at regular intervals.
These can be exploded with a cartridge.
sentences.cn: 这些物质可由起爆药起爆.

sentences.en: These can be ignited as by means of a squib or exploded with a cartridge.
sentences.cn: 这些物质可用点火头点燃或由起爆药起爆.

sentences.en: This rifle only holds one cartridge and so must be reloaded after each shot.
sentences.cn: 这支来复枪只能装一发子弹,所以在每次射击后都需重新装弹.

sentences.en: This rifle only holds one cartridge.
sentences.cn: 这支来复枪只能装一发子弹.

sentences.en: We are producing single lever faucet in economic body, with 35 mm cartridge.
sentences.cn: 我们现正制作单杠杆水龙头中的经济体, 并与35毫米弹壳.
